channel.title: Blurbs on Giacomo's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Blurbs on Giacomo's Blog

item.title: Speeding up fold computation
item.description: Computing folds is a large portion of the verifier work in schemes like FRI, STIR and WHIR. We describe an optimization to reduce this cost.

item.title: LDPC codes vs RS codes
item.description: Some thoughts on LDPC codes vs RS codes

item.title: STIR: Setting Parameters
item.description: STIR has a few more parameters to tweak compared to FRI. Here we mention a few and how they impact the concrete performance of the scheme.
